attributes.background: Ban petitions, just like the one to revoke article 50.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

We aren't sure whether you want to ban specific petitions or all petitions. It's not the UK Government or Parliament's responsibility to stop people petitioning about subjects they care about.

If you would like the UK Government and Parliament petitions site closed you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/251900
